devdoc.details: An extensible proxy contract that serves as a universal entry point for      interacting with the 0x protocol.

constructor.details: Construct this contract and register the `BootstrapFeature` feature.      After constructing this contract, `bootstrap()` should be called      by `bootstrap()` to seed the initial feature set.

getFunctionImplementation(bytes4).details: Get the implementation contract of a registered function.
